page.title: 13LONGSTANTON SCOUTS, GUIDES
page.content: Brownies, Guides and Cubs are active in Longstanton; the nearest Scout troops are at Bar Hill and Swavesey. { {Brownies}have existed here since 1953 when two teachers from the school started the pack. There are at present about 25 members. Recent activities have included a London trip, a bonfire, and ice skating and a disco with the Cubs.{The Guide company} was revived in 1983 by another teacher. It is struggling to maintain its initial momentum. In this 75th Anniversary year of Guiding the company has had a London trip and is camping this summer.{The Cub Pack}is very lively. Formed last year on the initiative of parents, it has about 20 members. This year there have been weekend camps, a day spent at Lowestoft, and various other outings.
